hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #the Ice Cavern# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the path to #Phantom Ganon#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple MQ Mirror Puzzle Invisible Chest

LH (Southwest Corner).text: Don't believe in yourself. Believe in the me that believes in you!
